text: This unit deals additional damage to buildings, which makes it highly effective in sieges.
Djinn are many different kinds of elemental spirits, considered by some scholars a kind of Daemon.
The Djinn Carriage transports four vessels, each containing a powerful Djinn. It can only summon one of the four Djinn in each battle.
This Arabyan unit comes from a desert nomad tribe. These nomads are known for their quick hit and run tactics.
This Arabyan unit comes from a city-state. These warriors are proud and well equipped.
The entangling ropes hinder foes, reducing their speed and melee defence.
